name.en: Practical Guide to the Physiological Signal Analysis in Clinical Medicine Using MATLAB
name.ch: 實用臨床醫學生理訊號分析-以MATLAB為例

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系跨領域轉譯醫學博士班
department.en: PhD in Institute of Translational and Interdisciplinary Medicine

goal.ch: 生理訊號可視為代表某個系統的輸出，隨著不同的生理情況如運動、疾病會有所變化，而深入了解生理訊號的特質並選擇合理的分析方法，可以幫助探索不同生理或病理狀況下生理機轉或其造成整體系統的改變。生物領域背景的學生多半無程式設計的背景，故希望籍由此課程介紹MATLAB程式語言及可能應用的生物訊號問題，期能幫助無程式設計背景的學生能透過此課程習得相關技能。本課程將以生理學的角度出發，提供不同情況下得到的臨床生理訊號的實例，教導學生如何應用以MATLAB程式搭配不同的分析方法或工具，幫助了解或解釋生物現象及機轉。
goal.en: "The physiological signals are the outputs generated by the systems beneath and can reflect the statuses of the systems during different conditions (such as exercise or diseases).  Analysis of yhose signals are, therefore, served as one of the noninvasive ways to understanding the systems.  This class is designed for the students from medical or biological background and aims to build their skills on analyzing biomedical signals."

outline.ch:
"(1) 資料的輸入及輸出
(2) 資料視覺化
(3) 程式流程控制
(4) 數位濾波及事件偵測
(5) 頻譜分析
(6) 心律變異度及血壓變異度分析
(7) 時頻分析
(8) 基礎生物統計執行
(9) 程式除錯"
outline.en:
"(1) Data import and export
(2) Data visualization
(3) Flow control of program(Loop, Conditional Branch)
(4) Filtering and event detection
(5) Power spectrum (brainwaves)
(6) Heart rate variability and blood pressure variability
(7) Time-frequency analysis
(8) Basic functions for biostatistics
(9) Debugging"

gradMethod.ch:
"出席率 50%
課堂表現 20%
期末專題 30%"

智慧財產價值創新、維護與尊重
